00011 // cylinder.cpp*
00012 #include "shape.h"
00013 // Cylinder Declarations
00014 class Cylinder: public Shape {
00015 public:
00016         // Cylinder Public Methods
00017         Cylinder(const Transform &o2w, bool ro, float rad,
00018                  float zmin, float zmax, float phiMax);
00019         BBox ObjectBound() const;
00020         bool Intersect(const Ray &ray, float *tHit,
00021                        DifferentialGeometry *dg) const;
00022         bool IntersectP(const Ray &ray) const;
00023         float Area() const;
00024         Point Cylinder::Sample(float u1, float u2,
00025                         Normal *Ns) const {
00026                 float z = Lerp(u1, zmin, zmax);
00027                 float t = u2 * phiMax;
00028                 Point p = Point(radius * cosf(t), radius * sinf(t), z);
00029                 *Ns = Normalize(ObjectToWorld(Normal(p.x, p.y, 0.)));
00030                 if (reverseOrientation) *Ns *= -1.f;
00031                 return ObjectToWorld(p);
00032         }
00033 protected:
00034         // Cylinder Private Data
00035         float radius;
00036         float zmin, zmax;
00037         float phiMax;
00038 };
00039 // Cylinder Method Definitions
00040 Cylinder::Cylinder(const Transform &o2w, bool ro, float rad,
00041                    float z0, float z1, float pm)
00042         : Shape(o2w, ro) {
00043         radius = rad;
00044         zmin = min(z0, z1);
00045         zmax = max(z0, z1);
00046         phiMax = Radians(Clamp(pm, 0.0f, 360.0f));
00047 }
00048 BBox Cylinder::ObjectBound() const {
00049         Point p1 = Point(-radius, -radius, zmin);
00050         Point p2 = Point( radius,  radius, zmax);
00051         return BBox(p1, p2);
00052 }
00053 bool Cylinder::Intersect(const Ray &r, float *tHit,
00054                 DifferentialGeometry *dg) const {
00055         float phi;
00056         Point phit;
00057         // Transform _Ray_ to object space
00058         Ray ray;
00059         WorldToObject(r, &ray);
00060         // Compute quadratic cylinder coefficients
00061         float A = ray.d.x*ray.d.x + ray.d.y*ray.d.y;
00062         float B = 2 * (ray.d.x*ray.o.x + ray.d.y*ray.o.y);
00063         float C = ray.o.x*ray.o.x + ray.o.y*ray.o.y - radius*radius;
00064         // Solve quadratic equation for _t_ values
00065         float t0, t1;
00066         if (!Quadratic(A, B, C, &t0, &t1))
00067                 return false;
00068         // Compute intersection distance along ray
00069         if (t0 > ray.maxt || t1 < ray.mint)
00070                 return false;
00071         float thit = t0;
00072         if (t0 < ray.mint) {
00073                 thit = t1;
00074                 if (thit > ray.maxt) return false;
00075         }
00076         // Compute cylinder hit point and $\phi$
00077         phit = ray(thit);
00078         phi = atan2f(phit.y, phit.x);
00079         if (phi < 0.) phi += 2.f*M_PI;
00080         // Test cylinder intersection against clipping parameters
00081         if (phit.z < zmin || phit.z > zmax || phi > phiMax) {
00082                 if (thit == t1) return false;
00083                 thit = t1;
00084                 if (t1 > ray.maxt) return false;
00085                 // Compute cylinder hit point and $\phi$
00086                 phit = ray(thit);
00087                 phi = atan2f(phit.y, phit.x);
00088                 if (phi < 0.) phi += 2.f*M_PI;
00089                 if (phit.z < zmin || phit.z > zmax || phi > phiMax)
00090                         return false;
00091         }
00092         // Find parametric representation of cylinder hit
00093         float u = phi / phiMax;
00094         float v = (phit.z - zmin) / (zmax - zmin);
00095         // Compute cylinder \dpdu and \dpdv
00096         Vector dpdu(-phiMax * phit.y, phiMax * phit.x, 0);
00097         Vector dpdv(0, 0, zmax - zmin);
00098         // Compute cylinder \dndu and \dndv
00099         Vector d2Pduu = -phiMax * phiMax *
00100                         Vector(phit.x, phit.y, 0);
00101         Vector d2Pduv(0, 0, 0), d2Pdvv(0, 0, 0);
00102         // Compute coefficients for fundamental forms
00103         float E = Dot(dpdu, dpdu);
00104         float F = Dot(dpdu, dpdv);
00105         float G = Dot(dpdv, dpdv);
00106         Vector N = Normalize(Cross(dpdu, dpdv));
00107         float e = Dot(N, d2Pduu);
00108         float f = Dot(N, d2Pduv);
00109         float g = Dot(N, d2Pdvv);
00110         // Compute \dndu and \dndv from fundamental form coefficients
00111         float invEGF2 = 1.f / (E*G - F*F);
00112         Vector dndu = (f*F - e*G) * invEGF2 * dpdu +
00113                 (e*F - f*E) * invEGF2 * dpdv;
00114         Vector dndv = (g*F - f*G) * invEGF2 * dpdu +
00115                 (f*F - g*E) * invEGF2 * dpdv;
00116         // Initialize _DifferentialGeometry_ from parametric information
00117         *dg = DifferentialGeometry(ObjectToWorld(phit),
00118                                    ObjectToWorld(dpdu),
00119                                                            ObjectToWorld(dpdv),
00120                                    ObjectToWorld(dndu),
00121                                                            ObjectToWorld(dndv),
00122                                    u, v, this);
00123         // Update _tHit_ for quadric intersection
00124         *tHit = thit;
00125         return true;
00126 }
00127 bool Cylinder::IntersectP(const Ray &r) const {
00128         float phi;
00129         Point phit;
00130         // Transform _Ray_ to object space
00131         Ray ray;
00132         WorldToObject(r, &ray);
00133         // Compute quadratic cylinder coefficients
00134         float A = ray.d.x*ray.d.x + ray.d.y*ray.d.y;
00135         float B = 2 * (ray.d.x*ray.o.x + ray.d.y*ray.o.y);
00136         float C = ray.o.x*ray.o.x + ray.o.y*ray.o.y - radius*radius;
00137         // Solve quadratic equation for _t_ values
00138         float t0, t1;
00139         if (!Quadratic(A, B, C, &t0, &t1))
00140                 return false;
00141         // Compute intersection distance along ray
00142         if (t0 > ray.maxt || t1 < ray.mint)
00143                 return false;
00144         float thit = t0;
00145         if (t0 < ray.mint) {
00146                 thit = t1;
00147                 if (thit > ray.maxt) return false;
00148         }
00149         // Compute cylinder hit point and $\phi$
00150         phit = ray(thit);
00151         phi = atan2f(phit.y, phit.x);
00152         if (phi < 0.) phi += 2.f*M_PI;
00153         // Test cylinder intersection against clipping parameters
00154         if (phit.z < zmin || phit.z > zmax || phi > phiMax) {
00155                 if (thit == t1) return false;
00156                 thit = t1;
00157                 if (t1 > ray.maxt) return false;
00158                 // Compute cylinder hit point and $\phi$
00159                 phit = ray(thit);
00160                 phi = atan2f(phit.y, phit.x);
00161                 if (phi < 0.) phi += 2.f*M_PI;
00162                 if (phit.z < zmin || phit.z > zmax || phi > phiMax)
00163                         return false;
00164         }
00165         return true;
00166 }
00167 float Cylinder::Area() const {
00168         return (zmax-zmin)*phiMax*radius;
00169 }
00170 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Shape *CreateShape(const Transform &o2w, bool reverseOrientation,
00171                 const ParamSet &params) {
00172         float radius = params.FindOneFloat( "radius", 1 );
00173         float zmin = params.FindOneFloat( "zmin", -1 );
00174         float zmax = params.FindOneFloat( "zmax", 1 );
00175         float phimax = params.FindOneFloat( "phimax", 360 );
00176         return new Cylinder(o2w, reverseOrientation, radius, zmin, zmax, phimax);
00177 }
